review: The reason I gave it 4 stars is because of a situation I encountered that prevented me from using my Fire Stick for a few weeks. About a week after setting it up (which was fairly straight forward) I had to reboot my modem. Now everything else that uses my Wi-Fi usually reacquires the connection but my Fire Stick did not. I had to go through the entire connecting and resetting my account. I found this out after trial and error. Otherwise I like it. Sometimes there is some streaming latency but I only have a moderate speed internet connection.
author: Roger A. Hackney "ArizonaRog"

review: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT TO USE IT FOR TRAVEL!!I bought this specifically because it states it is set up for log on to a captive portal such as you find at most hotels. This when your browser is redirected to a internet window where you accept terms and conditions of the provider and possibly provide a password. The advertising specifically states it does this. I received mine and it did not work. I called their support and the person I spoke to say it does not work and has never worked. It seems odd a company like Amazon would intentionally advertise a specific feature they know full well does not work. Since I cannot log on it does not work at all and I will have to rate it as a piece of junk. Change your advertising AMAZON. You should be ashamed of yourself.
